jd: From: priya, vyze ppundhir@vyzeinc.com Reply to: ppundhir@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Job Title: Sr. Project ManagerLocation: Local to OH, ON SITE! 25% travel required for plant visits, local to Columbus Duration: 6+ Months Visa: USC/GC/GC EAD Hard Requirements: Relatable manufacturing experience required. SaaS Experience is a must. Kronos experience, UltiPro implementations experience preferred. This candidate has to have excellent communication skills and very strong PM experience.Interview Process: One 15 minute prescreen call with me, one 30 minute teams interview with my manager, one to two client interviews (teams/possibly on site) This role was open back in July, then closed due to internal constraints. This is now back open and ready to hire. *** Please submit candidates with LinkedIn profiles and pictures as well, as this is a manufacturing based client who requires that*** Please note I work on a flex part time schedule, so I may not answer right away. Rest assured I will get to your candidates ASAP!
